artefact: Book a single annual test online

artefact.overview: This service allows you to book, reschedule or cancel an annual test or paid retest for a single vehicle only.
artefact.more_information:
You'll need to give the following details:

* vehicle registration number or trailer identification number
* vehicle make and model
* type of heavy goods vehicle (articulated or rigid) and the number of axles
- type and number of axles of any trailers
- for public service vehicles, the number of passengers it can carry 

##What you can't book

You can't use the service to book:

- dangerous goods tests
- voluntary tests
- part-paid tests
- Reduced Pollution Certificate tests
- Low Emission Certificate tests
- technical tests, eg a first-time trailer test
- vehicle identity checks
- Individual Vehicle Approval or motorcycle Single Vehicle Approval tests 

##Cancelling, rescheduling and viewing bookings

You'll need the order reference number you were given when the original booking was made, eg A123-BB44. 

You can also use this service to manage your VOSA pre-funded account, and update your contact details.

^You can't cancel within 3 days of a test or you'll lose your fee. You also can't reschedule on the day of a test.^

##Booking tests for multiple vehicles

You can also [book tests for multiple vehicles online](/book-tests-for-multiple-vehicles-online "book tests for multiple vehicles online"), but you'll need to register with VOSA first.

*[VOSA]: Vehicle and Operator Services Agency
artefact.introduction:
Book, reschedule or cancel an annual test or paid retest for a single vehicle only. This includes tests for:

- heavy goods vehicles, including horse boxes
- trailers
- vehicle and trailer combinations
- public service vehicles (PSVs)
